_comment: Unified MCP configuration for all modes

op-compact.description: Compact MCP - 4 meta-tools for discovering 148+ tools. Recommended for LLMs.

op-agents.description: Always-on cognitive agents: sequential_thinking, memory, context_manager, mem0, etc.

op-full.description: Full MCP - All tools directly exposed. May hit client tool limits.

recommended: Use 'op-compact' for discovering and using other tools
Both can be active simultaneously on different ports
workflow: 2. Use memory_remember to store important context
3. Use list_tools to discover available capabilities
4. Use get_tool_schema then execute_tool for specific tasks

cognitive: sequential_thinking - Step-by-step reasoning (think, plan, analyze, conclude)
memory - Key-value session state (remember, recall, forget, list)
context_manager - Persistent context (save, load, list, delete)
mem0 - Semantic vector memory (add, search, get_all, delete, update)

categories: language: python, rust, golang, javascript, typescript, etc.
